name: Rogue Chimera
description:
Made for the Roguelike Jam 4.

It's a traditiona Roguelike where you descend a deadly dungeon filled with traps and monsters.
Instead of equipment, you upgrade yourself by copying abilities of monsters. In order to do so, weaken them, then enter them using your Parasite ability.

Can you make it to the final floor and defeat the Chimera?

Stack abilities of the same type to upgrade them.

CONTROLS
WASD/Arrow keys: Move
Left Mouse: Select
Right Mouse: Deselect
Spacebar: Skip turn
1-4/Numpad 4, 5, 1, 2 - Ability shortcut
Q/Numpad 0 - Parasite ability shortcut
